特記事項: 本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。 The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
関連科目: 総合日本学習科目（異文化コミュニケーションＡ)／JSC The Study of Intercultural Communication A
授業方法:
• Utilize a wide variety of approach and experiential and interactive activities during the class and focus on student-driven exploration
• Utilize case studies and critical incidents to provide a deeper understanding of the contents and enhance the ability to apply critical thinking
• Work individual, pair or group on topics that relate to contents
• Encouraged to reflect their learning by writing journals

第1回:
Introduction to the course, Students self-introduction, Simulation activity for business intercultural communication and debrief & discussion
What’s culture?
Read assigned reading and prepare for class discussion.
第2回: The nature of intercultural communication and competencies (Skills, Knowledge & Attitudes), Geert Hofstede’s mental programing, Core cultural values and implications for business
Read assigned reading and prepare for class discussion.
第3回: Working in a multicultural team – “A World of Difference: Working Successfully Across Cultures” Part 1 (with DVD scenes)
Read assigned reading and prepare for class discussion.
第4回: Working in a multicultural team – “A World of Difference: Working Successfully Across Cultures” Part 2 (with DVD scenes)
Read assigned reading and prepare for class discussion.
第5回: Working in a multicultural team – “A World of Difference: Working Successfully Across Cultures” Part 3 (with DVD scenes)
Read assigned reading and prepare for class discussion.
第6回: Communicating across cultures – High/Low Communication Style, nonverbal cues, and silence
Read assigned reading and prepare for class discussion.
第7回:
Working across cultures: Diversity, Inclusion, Equity & Belonging: Unconscious biases, Psychological safety, Microaggression, Trust,
Case analysis
Read assigned reading and prepare for class discussion.
第8回: Emotional Intelligence (EI/EQ) in the workplace: Emotional Intelligence Model, Importance of EQ for managers and leaders?
Read assigned reading and prepare for class discussion.
第9回: Working with Japan (1) - Understand Japanese business culture on their own terms and find the way to bridge the gap
Read assigned reading and prepare for class discussion.
第10回:
Working with Japan (2) - Understand business practices and customs in Japan Critical incidents analysis
Discussion with a guest speaker
Read assigned reading and prepare for class discussion.
第11回: Leadership style: Situational Leadership, Cross-cultural leadership; Female leaders
Read assigned reading and prepare for class discussion.
第14回: Intercultural competences for working across cultures
Read assigned reading and prepare for class discussion.
